author: cnbc.com
title: Dawn Rana Joins Furnished Quarters as Director of Corporate Sales
text:
New York, NY, March 06, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Furnished Quarters , the largest independently owned and operated provider of temporary furnished apartments , announced today that Dawn Rana has joined the company as Director of Corporate Sales.
Dawn previously held management roles at Smith Corporate Living, National Corporate Housing, Wereldhave Management and Churchill Living, totaling approximately 20 years in the corporate housing industry. Her well-rounded experience includes developing new markets, fostering relationships with large corporate clients and overseeing operational needs.
As Director of Corporate Sales, Dawn will be tasked with targeting key growth sectors for Furnished Quarters. She will play a crucial role as the company continues expansion of its global corporate housing solutions .
“We look forward to leveraging Dawn’s comprehensive experience and strong relationships to meet an even wider range of client needs,” said Craig Partin, Chief Sales Officer of Furnished Quarters. “Her successful track record of generating new business makes her an opportune and timely addition to the Furnished Quarters team.”
About Furnished Quarters
Furnished Quarters is the largest independently owned and operated supplier of global temporary housing, offering over 100,000 fully furnished apartments in more than 800 cities around the world. The company, established in 1998 in New York City by brothers Steven and Gary Brown, currently serves more than 5,500 clients, ranging from top Fortune 500 corporations to small businesses. In late 2015, Furnished Quarters opened Q&A Residential Hotel in Lower Manhattan to offer nightly and weekly stays in full-sized apartments. To learn more about Furnished Quarters, visit furnishedquarters.com .
